hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Said Al-Khudri: Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "While I was sleeping I saw (in a dream) some people wearing shirts of which some were reaching up to the breasts only while others were even shorter than that. Umar bin Al-Khattab was shown wearing a shirt that he was dragging." The people asked, "How did you interpret it? (What is its interpretation) O Allah's Messenger (ﷺ)?" He (the Prophet (ﷺ) ) replied, "It is the Religion

chapter.ara-name: باب تَفَاضُلِ أَهْلِ الإِيمَانِ فِي الأَعْمَالِ
chapter.eng-name: The grades in superiority of the believers will be according to their good deeds
